column2: BRIEF-Hanesbrands Says CFO Barry Hytinen Reports Open Market Purchase Of 21,890 Shares At Avg Price Of $17.47/Share May 18 (Reuters) - HanesBrands Inc: * HANESBRANDS INC SAYS CFO BARRY HYTINEN REPORTS OPEN MARKET PURCHASE OF 21,890 SHARES AT AVERAGE PRICE OF $17.47PER SHARE ON MAY 17 - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2k8wCbg) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Hanesbrands Says CEO Gerald Evans Reports Open Market Purchase Of 17,500 Shares At Avg Price Of $17.66/Share May 18 (Reuters) - HanesBrands Inc: * HANESBRANDS INC SAYS CEO GERALD EVANS REPORTS OPEN MARKET PURCHASE OF 17,500 SHARES AT AVERAGE PRICE OF $17.66/SHARE ON MAY 16 - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2GuHbhI) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-HanesBrands Sees Q2 Sales $1.7 Billion To $1.725 Billion May 15 (Reuters) - HanesBrands Inc: * COMPANY REAFFIRMS 2(ND)-QUARTER AND ALL FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.45, REVENUE VIEW $1.71 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.76, REVENUE VIEW $6.77 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-HanesBrands Q1 Adj.
